title: Monoweight Hairline scripts
tags: hairline script thin pen cursive formal
content: Is there a font that exist like [Zaner](http://web.archive.org/web/20141109174933/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/ihof/p22-zaner/pro-one/), but without the thick strokes? Basically a font that looks like if you used a ballpoint pen to write a formal spencerian script. Any out there?
author: kosal

comments.content: Thanks, lets wait the next decade :P

Next decade? That’s a year and a day… : )

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO
ok, just wait a few days! lol
Oh, and I just thought of the lovely [P22 Allyson](http://web.archive.org/web/20141109174933/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/ihof/p22-allyson/). Not exactly monoline, but the strokes are very fine.
